name: Arty Swirly Colourful (Early Access)
description:
This game is currently in development, when I have time
Arty Swirly Colourful takes you into Canada’s astonishing wilderness.  Roam free in Arty Swirly Colourful and relax

- Detailed world full of delightful creatures to encounter

- Experience the changing world across seasons & weather

- Calming soundtrack that ebbs and flows with the seasons

- Take photos & edit them with an advanced camera system

Currently in Development Features:
- Seasonal shaders including snow & rain, affecting terrain

- Revamped weather particle fx

- Improved Rendering performance and stability

- Changing GI with time of day (currently there is just one set of GI data)

- Improved detail density and variety (forests and other areas should have more detail in them)
